verses.roman:
sei-kāle tapana-miśra kare gaṅgā-snāna
prabhu dekhi' haila tāṅra kichu vismaya jñāna

synonyms: sei-kāle—at that time; tapana-miśra—a brāhmaṇa named Tapana Miśra; kare gaṅgā-snāna—was taking his bath in the Ganges; prabhu dekhi'-seeing the Lord; haila—there was; tāṅra—his; kichu—some; vismaya jñāna—astonishment.
translation: At that time, Tapana Miśra was taking his bath in the Ganges, and he was astonished to see the Lord there.
